item.title: Obscure Ecologies
item.description: Obscure Ecologies is an algorithmic mashup of images, based on a a ruleset which mimics natural processes. Pixels on the digital canvas are transformed by an invisible ecology of creatures, which come to life, reproduce and die given the scarcity of the “food” in their pixel- based environment.
